-e ---

𒌁 ≈ 𒊺 𒉪 > 𒉣
𒌁 ≈ 𒀹𒑋𒈫𒐍

𒌁 TIR 𒌅 TU 𒂃 TUḪ TER tree

🌲🌲 ⇞⇞ ⇮⇮ ⇈ trees graphical if turned 90° 𒌁

𒌁 TER tree (s)
𒌁 TER terra, terrain 𓇾
𒌁 TIR trees [404x] = forest, wood; 木 mù mud 𓆷 𓇐 𓇏 𒌅 TUʳ տերտեր terter <> páter "priest" 𒌅 TU thee Dir (to) you 𒂃 TUḪ tag, attach

𒌁 tir bow bieg @ 𐌱𐌰𐌲𐌼𐍃 𒄑𒌁 <> 𒋾 TIʳ 𓌕 tîr @ tree
𒌁 tir ≈ tilpanu 𒌀𒉺𒉡 til-pa-nu “bow” 𒉼 PAN

𒌁 tir < тиӈур tiṇur ≈ τόξον "bow" 𒌁𒀭𒈾 tir-an-na tirana ≈ τόξον rainbow

𒌁 •Tannen > Ten 10 𒊺 + Nen 𒉣 NUN 𒉪 𒌑𒌃 󳼄 󳼅 ninni

𒌁 time in 𒀸𒌁𒍣 "in the time of"

𒍣 ZI <> cypres

• Z / TRI / ˢTIR

Micro etymology: 𒂃 + 𒉣𒇬 TUR = tree

ˢTIR

𒌁 𒊑 tir-ri turn
𒌁 𒊑 ˢtir-ri stirr
𒌑𒌁𒊏 úʳ-ˢtir-ra restore

𒌁 𒉣𒊺 NUN+ŠE ⇔ 𒄑 ngiš(e)
𒌁 •Tannen > Ten 10 𒊺 + Nen 𒉣

𒀊𒌁 ab-tir gore #paršu

𓋴𓆭 ash 𒀀𒌁 eša "a fine flour" ⚠️

𒁷𒌁 gamun 𒌑𒁷𒌁𒊬 cumin 𒂵𒁵 ga-mun

𒌁 <> tend / tear / trenn

𒌁·𒌁𒆸 TIR·TIR tread, track, footprint; #zukum ṣikoᵐ @ Tocharian #kabāsu;kibsu

𒀭𒊺𒌁 ŠE.NUN 𒊺𒉣 #Ašnan 𒊺𒉪 𒀭𒊺𒌁 ŠE.TIR ≈ Saturn (agricultural deity) σιτάρι sitári ! 𒀭𒊺𒌁 ŠE.TIR ≈ 𓊨 𓁹 ≈ Osiris ≈ Ceres ≈ Cronus ≈ Kronos ≈ 𒃶 KAN •Korn 𒀭𒊺𒌁 Grain <> 𒀭𒁕𒃶 Deo DA.GAN Dagan 𐤃𐤂𐤍 דָּגוֹן Dāgōn
